crumble.fields.consentModal.help: The consent modal will be shown to the user as soon as they open the page. The user can then choose to accept or decline the use of cookies, or chose to open the preferences modal for more detailed settings.
crumble.fields.preferencesModal.help: The preferences modal will be shown to the user when they click on the preferences button. The user can make detailed settings for single categories or services and customize the consent.
crumble.fields.disablePageInteraction.he: Prevents users from interacting with the page until they respond to the consent modal
crumble.fields.category.name.label: Name
crumble.fields.category.services.label: Services
crumble.fields.category.cookies.label: Cookies
crumble.fields.category.id.label: Internal ID
crumble.fields.category.domain.label: Domain
crumble.fields.category.expiration.label: Expiration
crumble.fields.category.autoDelete.label: Auto Delete cookie after revocation
crumble.fields.category.id.help: Enter an internal ID for this category. Must not be changed after creation.
crumble.fields.category.mandatory.label: Mandatory category
crumble.fields.category.mandatory.help: If enabled, this category cannot be disabled.
crumble.fields.title.label: Title
crumble.fields.buttons.help: If enabled, the buttons will be displayed in the same row and not below each other.
crumble.fields.description.label: Description
crumble.fields.acceptAll.label: "Accept all" Button
crumble.fields.acceptNecessary.label: "Accept necessary" Button
crumble.fields.showPreferences.label: "Manage preferences" Button
crumble.fields.savePreferences.label: "Save preferences" Button
crumble.strings.consentModal.title: We use cookies
crumble.strings.consentModal.description: This website uses essential cookies to ensure its proper operation and tracking cookies to understand how you interact with it. The latter will be set only after consent.
crumble.strings.preferencesModal.title: Manage cookie preferences
crumble.log.stats.title: Statistics
